insert into t_approve_detail ( name, flow_id, point_id, senior_id, approver, standard, modify_time ) values
(#{detail.name}, #{detail.flowId}, #{detail.pointId}, #{detail.seniorId}, #{detail.approver}, #{detail.standard}, #{detail.modifyTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT f.id, f.name, f.flow_id, f.status, f.point_id, d.name point_Name, group_concat(d.approver) approvers, type, tran_unique, applicant_id, applicant_name, reason, apply_time, finish_time, d.modify_time, d.senior_id FROM t_approve_flow f LEFT JOIN t_approve_detail d ON f.id = d.flow_id AND f.point_id = d.point_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND d.approver = #{userGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND apply_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND INSTR(applicant_name, #{applicantOrType})
AND f.status = 0 AND d.result IS NULL
AND f.status = -1
AND f.status = 1
AND f.status != 0
GROUP BY f.id
ORDER BY f.apply_time DESC
ORDER BY f.apply_time DESC
ORDER BY f.apply_time DESC
ORDER BY f.finish_time DESC
limit #{start} , #{length}
